.. Anchors: aliases



.. Title

inspur.sm.pdisk_info -- Get physical disks information.
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

.. Collection note

.. note::
    This plugin is part of the `inspur.sm collection <https://galaxy.ansible.com/inspur/sm>`_.

    To install it use: :code:`ansible-galaxy collection install inspur.sm`.

    To use it in a playbook, specify: :code:`inspur.sm.pdisk_info`.

.. version_added

.. versionadded:: 0.1.0 of inspur.sm

.. contents::
   :local:
   :depth: 1

.. Deprecated


Synopsis
--------

.. Description

- Get physical disks information on Inspur server.

.. Aliases


.. Requirements


.. Options

.. Notes


.. Seealso


.. Examples

Examples
--------

.. code-block:: yaml+jinja

    
    - name: Pdisk test
      hosts: ism
      connection: local
      gather_facts: no
      vars:
        ism:
          host: "{{ ansible_ssh_host }}"
          username: "{{ username }}"
          password: "{{ password }}"

      tasks:

      - name: "Get physical disks information"
        inspur.sm.pdisk_info:
          provider: "{{ ism }}"
